entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming northeast 30 this morning. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
